description.en: Clover is a Substrate-based DeFi service platform built on Polkadot. Clover provides an easy-to-use interoperable blockchain infrastructure through its extensive support for Ethereum’s EVM-based applications and a wide range of implemented developer tools. Through its smart core, like Clover Scan and Clover multi-chain extension wallet, Clover will bring the smoothest and most advanced DeFi experience to its users.
